multiple_choice_question.text: What type of pulsating star is being shown in Figure 1?
What is the general trend observed in the magnitudes of RRL stars in Figure 2 as the period increases?
choices: The magnitudes increase with increasing period.
The magnitudes decrease with increasing period.
The magnitudes remain constant with increasing period.
There is no clear trend between period and magnitudes.
